meanings.definition: A type of aromatic compound found in essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The cymols in the essential oil gave it a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: Essential oils often contain cymols that contribute to their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The cymols in the oil danced around, spreading their sweet scent.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like a bouquet of cymols, filling the room with floral notes.
meanings.sent5: The cymols in the air reminded him of a field of blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: A group of organic compounds with a specific chemical structure.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the cymols to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: Chemists identified a new group of cymols in the organic compound.
meanings.sent3: The cymols in the lab experiment seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The cymols bonded together like old friends, forming a strong compound.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of the cymols made them stand out in the mixture.
